name: LUXSUV
description: A web-based luxury ride services app providing premium transportation solutions for high-end clients. Features on-demand booking, real-time tracking, and secure payment integration.
responsibilities: Designed and developed the front-end interface using Vanilla JS and Bootstrap.
Integrated RESTful APIs for booking and payment processing.
Implemented geolocation for routing and tracking

name: TechLearn
description: An e-learning platform offering tech courses, assessments, certificates, and interactive learning sessions for professionals and students.
responsibilities: Developed responsive web interfaces using React and TailwindCSS.
Implemented dynamic routing using React Router.
Integrated backend APIs for user authentication, course data, and payment processing.
